mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY (COMMUNITY_ID, MEMBER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_AT, MODIFIED_AT, VIEWS) VALUES(#{communityId}, #{memberId}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, NULL, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT COMMUNITY_ID, MEMBER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_AT, MODIFIED_AT, VIEWS FROM COMMUNITY

SELECT COMM.COMMUNITY_ID, COMM.MEMBER_ID, COMM.TITLE, COMM.CONTENT, COMM.CREATE_AT, COMM.MODIFIED_AT, COMM.VIEWS, MEM.NICKNAME FROM COMMUNITY COMM INNER JOIN MEMBER MEM ON COMM.MEMBER_ID = MEM.MEMBER_ID WHERE COMM.COMMUNITY_ID = #{communityId}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUNITY SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content} , MODIFIED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE COMMUNITY_ID = #{communityId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY_FILE (COMMUNITY_FILE_ID, COMMUNITY_ID, FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CREATE_AT, MODIFIED_AT, FILE_EXTENSION, FILE_LINK) VALUES(COMMUNITY_FILE_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{COMMUNITYID}, #{FILENAME}, #{STOREDFILENAME}, #{FILESIZE}, SYSDATE, NULL, #{FILEEXTENSION}, #{FILELINK})

INSERT INTO COMMUNITY_FILE (COMMUNITY_FILE_ID, COMMUNITY_ID, FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CREATE_AT, MODIFIED_AT, FILE_EXTENSION, FILE_LINK) VALUES(COMMUNITY_FILE_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{COMMUNITYID}, #{FILENAME}, #{STOREDFILENAME}, #{FILESIZE}, NULL, SYSDATE, #{FILEEXTENSION}, #{FILELINK})
mapper.select: SELECT COMMUNITY_FILE_ID AS communityFileID, COMMUNITY_ID AS communityId, FILE_NAME AS fileName, STORED_FILE_NAME AS storedFileName, FILE_SIZE AS fileSize, CREATE_AT AS createAt, MODIFIED_AT AS modifiedAt, FILE_EXTENSION AS fileExtension, FILE_LINK AS fileLink FROM COMMUNITY_FILE WHERE COMMUNITY_ID = #{communityId}
